objections.title: It's too expensive
variants: I hear you, {{client_name}}. If we keep your monthly at {{monthly_premium|money}}, we still secure {{death_benefit|shortMoney}} in coverage. What matters most: price or protection for {{reason_from_needs_analysis}}?
Totally fair. Many clients start with our Bronze option for {{monthly_premium|money}} and upgrade later. Would that help you feel comfortable starting today?

objections.title: I need to talk to my spouse
variants: Absolutely. What do you think your spouse will care about most—price, benefits, or flexibility? We can send a summary now.
Great idea. While I have you, we can lock in {{death_benefit|shortMoney}} coverage for {{monthly_premium|money}} and change it after you both review. Sound good?
